message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $13,500 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $11,000 is simply too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $12,000?  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,500?
